Package com.advertisementproject.confirmationtokenservice.service.interfaces

Interface ConfirmationTokenService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfirmationTokenServiceImpl
public interface ConfirmationTokenService
Service for managing confirmation tokens in the database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.UUID confirmTokenAndGetUserId​(java.lang.String token)
    Finds a confirmation token based on token string, sets the token to confirmed and retrieves user id.
    void deleteAllConfirmationTokensByUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Deletes all tokens for the supplied user id
    java.lang.String generateAndSaveToken​(java.util.UUID userId)
    Generates and saves a confirmation token object in the database for a supplied user id, then returns token string

  • Method Details

    • generateAndSaveToken

      java.lang.String generateAndSaveToken​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Generates and saves a confirmation token object in the database for a supplied user id, then returns token string
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to create and save a confirmation token.
      Returns:
      the token string for the generated confirmation token.

    • confirmTokenAndGetUserId

      @Transactional java.util.UUID confirmTokenAndGetUserId​(java.lang.String token)
      Finds a confirmation token based on token string, sets the token to confirmed and retrieves user id.
      Parameters:
      token - the token string for the confirmation token to set to confirmed
      Returns:
      the user id related to the newly confirmed token

    • deleteAllConfirmationTokensByUserId

      void deleteAllConfirmationTokensByUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Deletes all tokens for the supplied user id
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to delete all confirmation tokens
